messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Condolences for Liza
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Mary. That s why size does matter :-) Liza ... [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Mary.
That's why size does matter :-)

Liza


On Friday, February 14, 2003, at 04:48 PM, zenmomma * wrote:

>
>
>
>
>
> >These past two weeks brought this space issue really well. My father
> >died and I literally had to leave the apartment so that I could cry in
> >peace.
>
> I'm so sorry for your loss. Losing a parent must be very hard. My
> thoughts
> are with you.
>
> Life is good.
> ~Mary


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Condolences for Liza
messages.msgSnippet: My thoughts and prayers to you Liza, and to you Janis on your dad s birthday. I am lucky enough to have both my parents.  But my husband lost both of his.  I
messages.messageBody:
My thoughts and prayers to you Liza, and to you Janis on your dad's birthday.

I am lucky enough to have both my parents. But my husband lost both of his. I didn't know his father. But I miss his mother terribly.

Take care of yourselves and be kind to yourselves,

Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: coyote's corner
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, February 14, 2003 6:03 PM
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Condolences for Liza


When I lost my dad, I was devastated. My thoughts and prayers go with you.
You will never stop missing him, but you will learn to live with it w/o
crying most of the time.
It's been almost twenty years and still I cry. Today is my dad's birthday.
He'd be. 80.
Janis

-----Original Message-----
From: zenmomma * [mailto:zenmomma@...]
Sent: Friday, February 14, 2003 4:48 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Condolences for Liza






>These past two weeks brought this space issue really well. My father
>died and I literally had to leave the apartment so that I could cry in
>peace.

I'm so sorry for your loss. Losing a parent must be very hard. My thoughts
are with you.

Life is good.
~Mary

When I lost my dad, I was devastated. My thoughts and prayers go with you.
You will never stop missing him, but you will learn to live with it w/o
crying most of the time.
It's been almost twenty years and still I cry. Today is my dad's birthday.
He'd be. 80.
Janis
